recommendations.recommendation: Add service worker registration, create proper manifest, implement install prompts
Ensure all touch targets are at least 44px x 44px, add proper touch feedback, implement mobile-specific gestures

recommendations.issue: Responsive design issues on mobile devices
recommendations.recommendation: Implement proper viewport meta tags, ensure readable font sizes, prevent horizontal scrolling
Implement service worker caching, add offline form support, enable data persistence
Optimize images for mobile, reduce JavaScript bundle size, implement lazy loading, improve Core Web Vitals
Add proper file input handling, implement image compression, add photo preview functionality
Implement geolocation API integration, add indoor positioning fallbacks, enable location tagging
Implement background sync API, add offline data queuing, enable automatic sync on reconnection
Improve touch target sizes, add proper ARIA labels, ensure keyboard navigation, check color contrast
Test on specific problematic devices, implement device-specific optimizations, ensure cross-platform compatibility
Comprehensive mobile optimization needed. Focus on PWA features, responsive design, and touch interactions.
